RETIREMENT BENEFIT PLANS

CMMT and CMVT of the Corporation adopted a pension plan under the Labor Pension Act (the “LPA”), which is a state-managed defined contribution plan. Under the LPA, an entity makes monthly contributions to employees’ individual pension accounts at 6% of monthly salaries and wages. NBCMMT, KSCMMT and KSCMS make monthly contributions at certain percentages of the basic salary of their employees.

The Corporation recognized expenses of NT$43,779 thousand and NT$41,592 thousand in the consolidated statements of comprehensive income for the years ended December 31, 2017 and 2016, respectively.
